review: Have to pay to see anything!
author: Catarina Faria

review: I like it fine . Excellent quality video. But I think it is ridiculous that they want to charge 1.99 per Dallas episode when it's already been out for the last 30 years on VHS and now on DVDS. Should be free!
author: Billy Flag

review: I like the fire stick. I don't like having to pay for movies as a Prime member. For a hundred bucks a year they should be free!
author: gina craig

review: Easy to set up . Worked great . Will be use primarily for Netfix
author: donna stad

review: Love it, but it's definitely awesome when you are an Amazon Prime customer.  VERY easy to use and I love the standard remote that comes with it - no more squinting in the dark to figure out which button I want!
author: Amber

review: I bought the Fire TV Stick to replace a Roku stick...I really like the speed of the UI as the one in the Roku is kind of sluggish...content wise it has everything that I wanted and also have the chance to play some games with it. Really nice device for the money.
author: Alex Loaiza

review: Great little box that does a lot. Very intuitive and speedy. I can stream movies through it or from my PC through the Plex app. So much for so little. I bought one for each room of the house.
author: Michael Odahowski

review: I lve my fire stick it's easy to use and has everything on it
author: laura
